column1: Chinnachowk is a census town in Cuddapah district  in the state of Andhra Pradesh

column3: 053. Males constitute 51% of the population and females 49%. Chinnachowk has an average literacy rate of 71%
column4: higher than the national average of 59.5%; with male literacy of 78% and female literacy of 64%. 11% of the population is under 6 years of age.
